column7: Practical experience in the rehearsal and public performance of traditional music, innovative compositions, and songs of brotherhood of various periods and styles. Open to all tenor, baritone, and bass voices on campus who have been accepted by audition, with assignments made according to proficiency. Completion of course involves, in addition to the regular schedule of rehearsals, participation in public performances by the ensemble. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Audition required and/or consent of instructor.
column9: 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Audition required and/or consent of instructor.
